name: Dice Tray Simulator
description:
Are you sick of the RNG on Roll20? Do you keep rolling 1's on D&D Beyond? Want to appease the Dice Gods by rolling in another system that just uses more RNG? Then download Dice Tray Simulator and see if you can finally make your attack rolls and saving throws!

The app also allows you to quickly access D&D Beyond. Just log in to access your characters and more!
